events.name: EV battery supply chain
events.wd_description: The increasing demand for electrical energy storage is driven by electric vehicles and stationary energy storage, intersecting battery production with transport and power sectors.
events.description: The increasing demand for electrical energy storage is driven by electric vehicles and stationary energy storage, intersecting battery production with transport and power sectors.

events.name: Global production network (GPN)
events.wd_description: GPN approach highlights the intersection of battery manufacturing with automotive and power sectors, focusing on economic and non-economic actors, network relations, and firm strategies.
events.description: GPN approach highlights the intersection of battery manufacturing with automotive and power sectors, focusing on economic and non-economic actors, network relations, and firm strategies.

events.name: Innovation strategies
events.wd_description: Firms engage in innovative strategies to enhance battery production networks, including research and development in collaboration with academia, industry, and government.
events.description: Firms engage in innovative strategies to enhance battery production networks, including research and development in collaboration with academia, industry, and government.

events.name: Cooperation strategies
events.wd_description: Cooperation among firms, including joint ventures and partnerships, to strengthen the battery production network and share resources.
events.description: Cooperation among firms, including joint ventures and partnerships, to strengthen the battery production network and share resources.

events.name: Competition strategies
events.wd_description: Firms compete within the battery production network to capture market share and technological advantage.
events.description: Firms compete within the battery production network to capture market share and technological advantage.

events.name: Supply chain analysis
events.wd_description: Analysis of the battery supply chain focuses on material transformation and trade, addressing supply and demand dynamics, trade structures, and supply risk.
events.description: Analysis of the battery supply chain focuses on material transformation and trade, addressing supply and demand dynamics, trade structures, and supply risk.

events.name: Material flow analysis
events.wd_description: Dynamic material flow analyses track the transformation and movement of materials within the battery supply chain.
events.description: Dynamic material flow analyses track the transformation and movement of materials within the battery supply chain.

events.name: Trade structure analysis
events.wd_description: Examines trade structures and their impact on the battery supply chain, including the flow of materials across borders.
events.description: Examines trade structures and their impact on the battery supply chain, including the flow of materials across borders.

events.name: Supply risk analysis
events.wd_description: Evaluates risks associated with the supply of critical raw materials for battery production, including geopolitical and environmental factors.
events.description: Evaluates risks associated with the supply of critical raw materials for battery production, including geopolitical and environmental factors.

events.name: Policy initiatives
events.wd_description: Various policy initiatives aim to secure and regionalize battery supply chains, addressing geopolitical and environmental concerns.
events.description: Various policy initiatives aim to secure and regionalize battery supply chains, addressing geopolitical and environmental concerns.

events.name: US policy initiatives
events.wd_description: The US uses policy measures, including the Defense Production Act, to support domestic production and processing of battery minerals.
events.description: The US uses policy measures, including the Defense Production Act, to support domestic production and processing of battery minerals.

events.name: EU policy initiatives
events.wd_description: The EU focuses on creating alternative supply chains for battery minerals to reduce dependence on external sources.
events.description: The EU focuses on creating alternative supply chains for battery minerals to reduce dependence on external sources.

events.name: National policy initiatives
events.wd_description: Individual countries implement policies to regionalize battery production, including restrictions on mineral exports and investments in domestic industries.
events.description: Individual countries implement policies to regionalize battery production, including restrictions on mineral exports and investments in domestic industries.

events.name: Upstream and downstream analysis
events.description: Upstream analysis focuses on raw material extraction and processing, while downstream analysis deals with the final stages of production and recycling.

events.name: Geopolitical factors
events.description: This involves understanding the impact of geopolitical tensions and policies on supply chain security and resource availability.

events.name: Regulation and legislation
events.description: This includes national and international regulations influencing battery production and supply chains.

events.name: Technological development
events.description: Research and development in battery technology, including innovations beyond lithium-based batteries.

events.name: Sustainability and ethical considerations
events.description: Focus on ethical sourcing of materials and sustainability in battery production.

events.name: Economic and noneconomic actors
events.description: This covers the roles of various stakeholders, including governments, corporations, and NGOs, in the global battery production network.
